_addLiquidity(StrategyWethWbtc,uint256).notice: ActionType: ADD_LIQUIDITY Add liquidity to mesh pool: [weth, wbtc] -> mesh lpToken

_removeLiquidity(StrategyWethWbtc,uint25.notice: ActionType: REMOVE_LIQUIDITY Remove liquidity from mesh pool: mesh lpToken -> [weth, wbtc]

_swapWbtcToWeth(StrategyWethWbtc,uint256.notice: ActionType: SWAP_ASSET_TO_TOKEN Swap on BeethovenX wbtc -> weth

_swapWethToWbtc(StrategyWethWbtc,uint256.notice: ActionType: SWAP_TOKEN_TO_ASSET Swap on BeethovenX weth -> wbtc
